001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.classinfo;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonGetter;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonPropertyOrder;
007import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.PropertiesUtils;
008
009import java.io.IOException;
010import java.util.Map;
011import java.util.NavigableMap;
012import java.util.Objects;
013import java.util.Optional;
014import java.util.jar.Attributes;
015import java.util.jar.JarFile;
016import java.util.jar.Manifest;
017import java.util.stream.Stream;
018
019import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toSortedMap;
020import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreStreamUtils.sortedMap;
021
022@JsonPropertyOrder(alphabetic = true)
023@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_EMPTY)
024public record JarFileInfo(
025    @JsonIgnore JarFile jarFile
026) {
027    public JarFileInfo {
028        Objects.requireNonNull(jarFile);
029    }
030
031    Optional<Manifest> manifest() {
032        try {
033            return Optional.ofNullable(jarFile.getManifest());
034        } catch (IOException e) {
035            return Optional.empty();
036        }
037    }
038
039    @JsonGetter
040    NavigableMap<String, String> getManifestMain() {
041        return sortedMap(manifest().stream()
042            .map(Manifest::getMainAttributes)
043            .flatMap(JarFileInfo::manifestAttrs));
044    }
045
046    @JsonGetter
047    NavigableMap<String, NavigableMap<String, String>> getManifestSections() {
048        return manifest().stream()
049            .map(Manifest::getEntries)
050            .flatMap(JarFileInfo::manifestSections)
051            .collect(toSortedMap(JarFileInfo::attrsEntryMap));
052    }
053
054    private static NavigableMap<String, String> attrsEntryMap(Map.Entry<?,Attributes> attrsEntry) {
055        return sortedMap(manifestAttrs(attrsEntry.getValue()));
056    }
057
058    private static Stream<Map.Entry<String, String>> manifestAttrs(Attributes attrs) {
059        return attrs.entrySet().stream().map(PropertiesUtils::propEntry);
060    }
061
062    private static Stream<Map.Entry<String, Attributes>> manifestSections(Map<String, Attributes> sections) {
063        return sections.entrySet().stream();
064    }
065}
